item.description:
Beer and pizza anyone? Every Sunday this summer Harpoon is hosting Zach Stremlau from Green Mountain Flour and his copper-clad, wood-fired oven. Their kitchens will be closed but Zach will make pizza using fresh local ingredients and they will of course be serving beer from their taps!
http://www.harpoonbrewery.com/index.cfm/page/Sunday-Evening-Beer-and-Pizza-at-the-Harpoon-Brewery-in-Windsor/cdid/177851/pid/28549

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Sunday Evening Beer and Pizza at the Harpoon Brewery in Windsor
